response.overview: Human beings are capable of incredible feats of endurance, and GBDURO is a challenge that will test even the strongest bike riders. 2000 kilometres across England, Wales and Scotland, with 37,000 metres of climbing, on road and gravel. It’s the ultimate bike-packing race.  COVID rules mean the 2020 GBDURO is completely self-sufficient, the riders surviving only on what they can carry, or source from nature. It’s the most brutal ultra-endurance race ever to take place in the UK, and the competitors have to dig deep into their physical and mental reserves in pursuit of their goal.  Victory is not winning the race, it’s simply reaching the finish line.
response.title: GBDURO
